emuInput.TitMainTitle: Full length portrait of two women, including bride Betty Harris Gaskins, and two men, including groom Tommy Gaskins, in Harris Studio, another version
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 27, 1946. pg. 2, reads: "HOLY MATRIMONY - Miss Betty Harris, daughter of George E. Harris of 2121 Wylie Avenue, and Thomas E. Gaskins were united in marriage recently at the home of the Rev. Cornell E. Talley with a few friends in attendance.  A reception was held the following day at the home of the bride's grandmother, Mrs. Florence Graves, of 6706 Deary Street, East End.  George E. Harris, is the brother of Courier Photographer Charles "Teenie" Harris. - Harris Photo."
